entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
